# Evaluation

## Sub-Phases

### Evaluate Results
- Assess the accuracy and reliability of forecasts.
- Compare results against business objectives.

### Review Process
- Analyze the effectiveness of the data preparation and modeling phases.
- Identify areas for improvement in the workflow.

### Determine Next Steps
- Decide whether to proceed with deployment or refine the models.
- Document lessons learned and recommendations.

## Objectives
- Evaluate the accuracy and reliability of forecasting models.
- Review the app's ability to meet business objectives.

## Deliverables
- Evaluation report for forecasting models.
- Decision on model deployment and app readiness.
